body.p: Controls whether or not the event that caused the popup to be automatically dismissed (or "rolled up") should be consumed or be dispatched as a normal event. If a non-default behavior is desired, this method should be called immediately prior to calling template.XULMeth("openPopup") or template.XULMeth("openPopupAtScreen").

dl.dd: The default for the current platform.

body.div: Note: This method did not work on Mac OSÂ X prior to Gecko 1.9.2 (Firefox 3.6).
